explanation: [0-0] On a blue tennis court, a man in a white shirt and purple shorts holds a tennis racket in his right hand and a tennis ball in his left hand. Two staff members in blue clothes are standing outside the blue tennis court, and many spectators are sitting in the audience seats behind. The words "MARRY ME, ROGER" are written in white on the screen.
